name: Hue Serene Palace Hotel
address: 21 Lane 42 Nguyen Cong Tru, Huế, Việt Nam
description:
Hue Serene Palace Hotel tọa lạc tại vị trí chiến lược, trong bán kính 1 km từ Sông Hương và Cầu Tràng Tiền nổi tiếng. Chỗ nghỉ có phòng nghỉ hiện đại được trang bị máy tính cá nhân và cung cấp Wi-Fi miễn phí trong toàn bộ khuôn viên.

Khách sạn chỉ cách Đại Nội Huế 2 km và ga Huế khoảng 3 km. Sân bay Huế và sân bay quốc tế Đà Nẵng cách khách sạn lần lượt 15 km và khoảng 90 km.

Phòng nghỉ lắp máy điều hòa tại đây có sàn gỗ parquet và được trang bị đầy đủ tiện nghi với tủ để quần áo, két an toàn cá nhân, TV truyền hình cáp màn hình phẳng cùng khu vực ghế ngồi. Tiện nghi pha trà và cà phê được cung cấp miễn phí. Phòng tắm riêng đi kèm máy sấy tóc, áo choàng tắm và đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí.

Bàn đặt tour của Hue Serene Palace Hotel có thể hỗ trợ khách sắp xếp các chuyến tham quan và việc đi lại. Quầy lễ tân 24 giờ có thể bố trí phòng giữ hành lý và dịch vụ giặt là. Trong số các tiện nghi tại chỗ nghỉ còn có dịch vụ văn phòng, dịch vụ thu đổi ngoại tệ và dịch vụ cho thuê xe đạp/xe hơi.

review.comment_positive: Nhân viên lễ tân nhiệt tình thân thiện, các chị nhà hàng hỗ trợ bữa sáng cũng nhiệt tình nữa. Về thái độ của nhân viên thì không có gì để chê hết. Vị trí của khách sạn cũng rất tiện lợi luôn. Phòng đẹp và rộng rãi hơn mong đợi, có bồn tắm nhưng ko có mini bar.
review.comment_negative:
-Ở tầng 2 nhưng wifi chập chờn rất không tốt. Khó kết nối tự động mà phải vào trong bấm để kết nối. Đang dùng thì bị mất hút wifi. Sóng thì đôi lúc chỉ có 1 vạch.
-Buffet sáng thì cũng nhiều món ổn với quy mô khách sạn, nhưng nước dưa hấu/ chanh dây/ và nước gì nữa trong 3 loại nước trái cây mỗi buổi sáng dở quá, kiểu như 90% là nước lọc, 10% là nước trái cây kia trộn vào. Uống mà không có vị gì luôn á.
Mọi thứ ở khách sạn đều rất tốt, hi vọng khách sạn có thể ghi nhận ý kiến để cải thiện khách sạn ngày càng tốt hơn.

review.rating: Budget Hotel with FIVE STAR Staff!
review.room_type: Phòng Junior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Located in a quiet side road, this hotel was extremely comfortable.  Restaurants and bars are located within easy walking distance.  Places to hire scooters are on the doorstep!  The breakfast served in the downstairs area was delicious and plentiful - more than enough to set up any traveller for the day.  The staff on hand to serve the breakfast were absolutely wonderful!  They were so friendly and eager to help and serve where needed.  Let me just say .... this is a budget hotel, but the staff are FIVE STAR!

review.comment_positive:
Вежливый персонал, администратор говорит по-английски. Дали карту достопримечательностей, подсказали хорошее кафе поблизости. 
В номере мягкие кровати с большими одеялами, в ванной есть все принадлежности (зубные щётки, расчёски, мыло, шампунь). Уборка ежедневно. 
Рядом с отелем по выходным перекрывают две улицы и они становятся пешеходными, на них огромное количество баров и кафе.
По утрам на первом этаже подают завтрак шведский стол. Также можно заказать разные варианты яичниц и местный суп.
review.comment_negative: Высокая слышимость соседей и коридора.

review.rating: Nice hotel for a good price
review.room_type: Phòng Junior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
The room was spacious and fairly modern in the center of Hue close to bars and restaurants.

The room had a good air con, fridge, water, TV and room cleaning was offered daily. The bathroom has a bath which is rare. 

Bed was very soft and comfortable and the room had good lighting it felt cosy. 

Staff were all very friendly and helpful offering to help with booking trips, local advice or transport. 

Breakfast was good with different fresh egg options and lots of fruit.
review.comment_negative:
There was some noise from other guests which woke us up early.

Some areas of the hotel felt dated and like they needed some modernising such as the lobby, restaurant and corridors. Photos make the hotel look more modern and contemporary.

review.rating: Great location and very helpful staff
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: A very nice location in Hue, with a tonne of great places for food and coffee nearby. The staff are also very helpful and accommodating in terms of directions, providing a good breakfast menu and arranging transport.
review.comment_negative: We paid for a double room and were instead given two single beds pushed together, with one of them being probably the loudest bed I’ve ever slept in. It would make a tonne of noise every time either of us moved or sat up right. Not ideal for a couple staying together if you get what I mean. Other than that, a nice and accommodating hotel.

review.rating: Alles perfekt - wären gerne länger geblieben
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Hier wären wir im Nachhinein tatsächlich gerne länger geblieben. Das Zimmer war groß und das sauberste auf unserer ganzen Reise. Bett war sehr bequem. Wir hatten alles im Zimmer, was man so braucht. Roller konnten wir problemlos über das Hotel mieten, und als wir ihn nicht mehr gebraucht haben, einfach den Schlüssel an der Rezeption wieder abgeben. Es gab viel Auswahl beim Frühstück, das sehr gut geschmeckt hat.
review.comment_negative: Das Einzige, was wir bemängeln könnten, ist, dass wir am letzten Tag zum Frühstück noch Bun Bo Hue probieren wollten, es aber genau an diesem Morgen leider aus war. War zwar schade, hat aber unseren Aufenthalt im Serene Palace nicht getrübt.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Está en una zona muy animada y céntrica pero en una calle muy tranquila, sin tráfico ni ruidos. La habitación era grande, cómoda y limpia, y el personal superatento. Probamos el menú degustación la primera noche y estaba buenísimo. Recomendado.
review.comment_negative: Para ir de Hue a Hoi An nos animamos a coger el traslado en coche que nos propusieron, estaba bien de precio (1.500.000 d, unos 55 euros), pero las paradas establecidas en el itinerario para hacer alguna foto etc. no valen mucho la pena (a menos que te guste que, oh, sorpresa, estén estratégicamente situadas junto a los bares y tiendas de souvenirs que elige el conductor…) Mejor pensar de antemano dónde quieres parar tú o hacerlo del tirón.

Overall was a great experience. The staff is really attentive and professional. Highlight to Sarah that made our stay even better with all the help and tips about what to visit and helping us booking the transport to Phong Nha. We rent a motorbike that was spotless and at a good rate.
Breakfast is good, good coffee, good eggs, good pancakes…
Room was clean with good areas. We extended our stay one night more.

review.rating: Very comfortable place in the centre of town
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Very friendly staff, comfortable room, central location, functioning WiFi, great value for money. It's a perfect base for exploring the old town. You can walk to the Imperial City in about 20 minutes, and there are plenty of taxis and other transport options too. Loads of restaurants and cafes nearby.
review.comment_negative: Location is in a narrow alley that felt a little seedy (although I think it was quite safe). Scooters seem to use it as a cut-through when the nearby streets are closed at night, so it can be a little difficult to navigate. But taxis can just about get through.

review.comment_negative: The bathroom facilities were primitive. Water pressure was almost non-existent. The taps didn't work properly, the shower was handheld (what a disgrace) so my wife had to hold the shower while I washed myself, I had to do the same for her while standing in a bath for CS. 15 minutes to figure out how to operate the maze of taps. The tap in the sink nearly fell off the sink. Plus we weren't advised the restaurant was closed - that was after spending ten minutes of deciding on the menu and going down to reception to find out it was closed - JHC not even a club sandwich was available....

review.room_type: Phòng Junior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Je partage mon expérience dans l’hôtel 

Ma mère à fait un malaise suite à de forte chaleur.
Le personnel à était tout simplement INCROYABLE ils ont pu établir les premiers secours car elle et tombée sur la tête. Ensuite nous prévenir par téléphone.

Une fois arriver ma mère était entre bonne main de la réception Merci à Mme Thi qui a accepté ma demande de venir avec moi a l’hôpital pour faciliter les démarches et la traduction france-Vietnam 

Mme Thi la dame qui travaille à l’hôtel de la réception et rester avec nous à l’hôpital pour s’assurer que tout ce passe bien dans nôtre malheur un grand remerciement pour elle.

D’autant plus les chambres sont très propres le personnel de l’ensemble de l’hôtel et très professionnel ils nous ont assurer un guide franco-vietnamien pour la découverte des temples et cités impérial dans notre langue avec taxi.

Le petit déjeuner et très bon.

Je recommande très fortement cette hôtel qui seront vous accueillir dans le cadre du respect.

Bravo à toute l’équipe

review.comment_positive: Ottima posizione centrale, vicino a ristoranti e negozi e alle zone di interesse del centro di Hué. Stanza grande, con balconcino, bollitore e set di cortesia. Personale super disponibile che parla bene inglese, con loro abbiamo organizzato un trasferimento al parco di Phng Nha. Lo consiglio, ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo!

review.comment_positive:
I’ve stayed at A LOT of hotels and I can tell this hotel cares a lot and listens to reviews. The staff was excellent. They were class A fantastic. 

I can tell they listen to reviews because they have implemented barriers from the lobby to the first floor, so that rooms can be more sound proof. I’m not sure if it has worked a ton because I was on the 7th floor. 

The complimentary breakfast was REALLY good. 

My room was quiet 😊 The a/c was very nice. the room was spacious and had coffee, a kettle and a nice size balcony. wow. the view from it was so relaxing and gorgeous; it’s just of the city, but, still, really beautiful.

review.room_type: Phòng Junior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Später ist man immer schlauer und ich hatte leider nur 1 Nacht gebucht. Hué ist aber die schönste Stadt in Vietnam für mich und bietet gute Ausflüge in die Umgebung. Das Serene Palace liegt in einer kleinen Seitenstraße und daher relativ ruhig und doch super zentral. Das Hotel ist sehr schön gestaltet und wirkt luxuriös. Das Zimmer entsprach meinen Erwartungen. Das Personal hat mich wunderbar in Empfang genommen und dabei unterstützt, mich in der Stadt zu orientieren. Auch konnte ich meine Weiterreise mit ihnen sehr unkompliziert organisieren (Danke Sarah!) und bekam die perfekte Hilfe, als ich mich kurzentschlossen entschied länger zu bleiben, um den Bach Ma Nationalpark zu besuchen (Receptionist Name leider vergessen). Im Hotel arbeiten wirklich nette und aufmerksame Leute und viele sprechen gut Englisch!
review.comment_negative: Baubedingt (Steinböden, usw.) schließen Türen relativ laut und Stimmen sind leicht zu hören. Wer in der Nähe des Aufzugs ein Zimmer hat ist hier vielleicht mehr betroffen als am anderen Ende.

Camerele sunt spațioase, curate, aerisite. Mic dejun delicios și variat.  Ne-au explicat ce putem vizita și ne-au ajutat si cu programarea transportului la plecare. 5 * pentru interesul pe care-l acorda proprietarul  structurii pentru a  creea confort clientilor săi si felicitari angajatilor pentru felul in care trateaza clienți. Recomand cu drag. Sigur voi reveni

review.comment_positive:
浴室水量很大，洗髮精和沐浴乳都用得很習慣，冷氣很涼，服務員熱心笑容可掬，態度非常好，也有包車選項可供購買，但因時間關係我們只去了啟定陵和皇城，所以就都只用grab。早餐該有都有，也可以另外單點，像是順化牛肉麵、歐姆蛋都有，住宿包早餐這樣cp值不錯！
最後check out找錯錢時旁邊的服務員也很伶俐發現並提醒，是個非常值得信任的旅館。此外check out時間是12點，對於只住一晚的我們，安排行程時間非常彈性，因應很熱的順化也是可以隨時回飯店休息，推薦。
review.comment_negative: 沒有~啊 進來的路太小，grab不好進來，但走到大點路也不會太遠，所以覺得還好，可能腳不方便的人要注意一下。

ห้องไม่เก็บเสียงเลย ได้ยินเสียงห้องข้างๆ ดังมาก  ทั้งดึกดื่นและเช้าตรู่ เสียงประตูปิด เสียงเข้าห้องน้ำ เสียงคุยกัน ได้ยินหมด

แม่บ้านทำงานไม่สะอาด (แขกที่พักห้องข้างๆ ส่งเสียงดังตะโกนโหวกเหวกและสกปรก เอาถุงขยะที่ใส่อาหารเหลือมาทิ้งไว้หน้าห้อง น้ำไหลนองออกจากถุงเลอะเทอะ แจ้งพนักงาน ก็มาเก็บถุงไป แต่ไม่ได้เช็ดน้ำที่ไหลนอง ต้องแจ้งไปอีกรอบ)

ทำเลไม่ดี อยู่ในซอยเล็กๆ สกปรก

ภาพล็อบบี้ ไม่ตรงปกอย่างแรง ของจริงมืดๆทึ่มๆแคบๆ

Seuls d autres clients sont venus près de moi. Honteux!
De plus, la dame de la réception ne parlait pas anglais et était incapable de m'orienter ou de me conseiller pour des visites à faire dans les environs.
Petit déjeuner très limité. 
Je ne conseille cet hôtel que pour son emplacement, mais n'ayez aucune autre attente!

review.comment_positive: Nous avons passé un séjour dans cet hôtel charmant et paisible, accueillant notre grande famille avec chaleur et hospitalité. Avec un groupe de 9 personnes, trouver un endroit où chacun se sent à l'aise n'est pas toujours facile, mais cet établissement a su répondre à toutes nos attentes. Le petit déjeuner était non seulement délicieux mais aussi généreux. Le personnel a été d'une gentillesse exemplaire, toujours prêt à nous aider et à répondre à nos besoins. Une expérience inoubliable dans un cadre chaleureux et familial, nous recommandons vivement cet hôtel à tous ceux qui recherchent la tranquillité et l'accueil chaleureux.
review.comment_negative: Un séjour sans fausse note dans cet hôtel où tout était parfait du début à la fin. L'accueil chaleureux et familial nous a immédiatement mis à l'aise, et le personnel a été d'une gentillesse remarquable tout au long de notre séjour.

review.rating: Лучший сервис европейского уровня! Очень хорошие матрасы, мы выспались! Божественный завтрак!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Мне здесь понравилось абсолютно все! Здесь мы получили лучший сервис во Вьетнаме. Мы уезжали вечером, и персонал любезно предложил оставить багаж и мы смогли насладиться прогулкой по городу. Когда вернулись , то ребята с ресепшн предложили принять душ! И в дорогу дали нам фруктов. Это бесподобное гостеприимство. А какой здесь завтрак. Обязательно приезжайте  и попробуйте! Ощутите на себе сервис европейского уровня.

review.rating: Khách sạn nhỏ trong hẻm, chi phí hợp lý!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Phòng thoáng, đủ đồ dùng cần thiết. Nhà vệ sinh sạch sẽ, rộng rãi.
Bữa sáng không nhiều món nhưng mùi vị khá ổn. Mình ở 2 đêm thì bữa sáng y hệt nhau.
Nhân viên chuyên nghiệp, nhiệt tình và lịch sự.
Trong hẻm và gần khách sạn có nhiều tiệm giặt ủi, quán ăn.
review.comment_negative:
- Khách sạn trong hẻm không có chỗ đậu ô tô, phải đi gửi bãi, tuy nhiên bãi gửi cũng gần khách sạn, đi bộ ổn.
- Đa số nhân viên đều lịch sự và vui vẻ, chỉ một số nhân viên phục vụ bữa sáng nhìn lúc nào cũng như đang bực bội. Không rõ khách sạn có quy định mỗi người chỉ được ăn bao nhiêu hay không, mà mình thấy có vẻ như mình gọi phần ăn hơi nhiều một chút nên các bạn ấy không vui?!?!?!
- Buổi tối đã 10h30 - 11 giờ đêm mà có 1 đoàn khách vào ồn ào không thể tưởng, mở cửa phòng nói chuyện từ phòng này gọi sang phòng khác cứ như đang ở nhà. Mà đoàn khách này ồn ào từ dưới thang bộ đi lên chứ không phải lên tới phòng mới ồn như vậy. Nhưng lễ tân bên dưới hình như không nghe thấy, mình phải gọi điện nhờ nhắc nhở.

review.comment_positive:
El personal fue super amable. Nos permitieron hacer el check in a las 5am que llego nuestro bus nocturno por un muy pequeño suplemento.

A la mañana siguiente nos explicaron que hacer en la ciudad y nos ofrecieron servicio de transporte en nuestro caso a Hoi An, mas barato que las agencias de alrededor.

La habitación es amplia, cama muy cómoda y con aire acondicionado. Baño bien, limpio y con todo tipo de amenities.

The room was clean and very cozy. Locationwise the hotel is in a very narrow and quiet street, but not far from the restaurants.
The staff was really friendly. I was provided with waterbottles every day and they helped me with choosing and booking tours and a private driver and even asked me every evening about my day. 
Breakfast was very good. There was lots of fruit, toast, rice, noodles, soup, bacon, fresh juices etc and also I could order different egg variations every day. Su su and the breakfast team made sure I was ready for the day.

review.comment_positive:
L’emplacement, en plein centre de la ville moderne, dans une ruelle au calme, avec un petit-déjeuner parfait et une très bonne literie. À côté de nombreux restaurants, 10/15mn à pied de la rivière des parfums et 10mn en voiture de la Cité Impériale et petit plus un superbe bar lounge dans un jardin à deux pas de l’hôtel.
Le personnel de l’hôtel parle très bien anglais, est charmant, disponible et d’une grande aide pour la réservation de billets de train, d’avion.Possibilité de réserver une voiture à la journée pour la visite des sites aux alentours de Hué.
Je recommande vivement !!
review.comment_negative: Le seul petit bémol, qui est un détail, l’éclairage de la chambre un peu simple (4 spots au plafond et 2 petites liseuses de chaque côté du lit)

review.comment_negative: Un dispositif pour sécher ou au moins accrocher le linge dans les chambres serait apprécié pendant la saison très humide. Petit déjeuner moins bon qu’espéré.

review.comment_positive: Beautiful hotel within walking distance of everything, but no noise from the street. Room was big and comfortable. The staff were so helpful and kind, we felt very welcome. We were allowed in our room earlier than the official check-in time and were welcomed by swan-shaped towels and rose petals. Beds were very big and comfortable, not too hard, which is an achievement in itself in Vietnam. Breakfast was nice, nothing too special but tasted good.
review.comment_negative: If you have very noisy people in the room next to you (which we did, with loud TV, dancing and even singing at one point) you'll hear very well, but it's not the hotels fault :)

review.rating: A fantastic hotel, location and friendly staff!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Fantastic hotel in a great location. Staff spoke great English and were super helpful with my requests. The room was exactly as advertised with a great balcony to soak in the atmosphere of Hue, with a fantastic A/C to ensure my comfort. Bathroom was very clean with no signs of mould or disrepair. 

They organised a taxi for me for the day to visit all major sites/tombs, at a much more affordable rate than a tour company. Additionally, their laundry service was quick and cheap, and my clothes came back folded, pressed and smelling great - all perks for a backpacker. 

Location was quite close to most attractions inner-city, walking distance to Dong Ba Market, and a stones throw away from the Night Street. 

I will definitely be staying here again when I return to Hue.
review.comment_negative: A very minor complaint, however the bathtub/shower combo was a bit dated. A very very minor complaint for an otherwise fantastic stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Junior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Location of the hotel is in the centre of tourist spot where restaurant and many things are in nearby super convenient. Despite that, the hotel is quiet and comfortable to sleep at night.

In general, Hue citizens seemed familiar with talking with foreigners in English. They looked most comfortable using English in Vietnam in my view.
review.comment_negative:
Breakfast was poor in terms of variety and service. I felt that waitresses were serving mainly to Caucasian in priority instead who come to the table first. Anyone staying the hotel first time would not know the availability of egg dish and soup noodle. In addition, the space of breakfast food and dish area seemed too small. Everyone has to pick up dishes and glasses from the bottom shelf pretty close to the ground floor. Nobody wishes to use those kitchen utensils due to low hygiene condition displayed at almost same level as ground floor. 

I suggest the kitchen space to be 200% bigger than current space for better and cleaner display of food and utensil. Furthermore, setting roles to each waitresses instead of their random approaches and not being aware of new customers sitting at the restaurant. There were too many people with low efficiency but having sugar mouthed with nice smile.

review.comment_positive: Staff at Hue Serene Palace Hotel were wonderful - super helpful with suggestions of where to visit in Hue and also helped organise a private driver. Sarah in particular was amazing!
review.comment_negative:
Climate control could have been better outside of the rooms and lobby. At times you were waiting for an elevator in excess of 5 minutes during busy periods as there is only one elevator for all guests and staff, and you can easily start sweating in the heat of the day before even leaving the hotel.
I had lost the keycard to my room, and happily agreed to pay for the replacement. The only issue being that once lost, every time I wanted to access the room, a member of staff had to accompany me to let me into the room. They should in truth have spares that they could have programmed.

review.comment_positive:
- Le personnel très accueillant et avenant. Ms. Lien, tout comme ses collègues, est très disponible et de bons conseils. Nous avons testé les 2 restaurants conseillés (Madame Thu et Hành) et les avons trouvés excellents. Tout comme la bonne adresse pour acheter les friandises de Hue (Me Xung). Cela rend le séjour agréable et nous donne envie de revenir dans cet hôtel :).
- L'emplacement : proche de commerces et de restaurants. A distance de marche de principaux sites d'intérêt (cité imperiale, marché Dong Ba, pont Trang Tien,...).
- Le transfert organisé depuis l'aéroport de Hue.
- L'organisation de notre trajet en bus vers Hoi An.
- La décoration de la chambre a un certain cachet.
review.comment_negative:
- L'évacuation d'eau de la douche n'était pas la plus optimale (c'était loin d'être catastrophique ;)). Malheureusement, c'est souvent le cas en Asie... 
- Certains murs de la chambre mériteraient une petite rénovation.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Chị quản lý và các bạn nhân viên nhiệt tình, thân thiện, hỗ trợ tốt, sẵn lòng khắc phục hỗ trợ khách.
Địa điểm đi lại khá thuận tiện.
Phòng đầy đủ tiện nghi.
review.comment_negative:
Phòng cách ly kém. Mình ở tầng 3 phòng khá tối và hơi bí, đặc biệt là vô cùng ồn ào lúc tối muộn và đầu giờ sáng. Bị nghe rõ tiếng chân đi lại ngay trên đầu trên tầng 4, tiếng người đi lại cười nói ngoài cầu thang và hành lang và tiếng nói chuyện vọng từ tầng 1. Mình có feedback với quầy lễ tân thì hôm sau được hỗ trợ chuyển lên tầng 7( tầng cao nhất) thì không nghe thấy tiếng ồn trên đầu nữa, nhưng tầng 1 mà mọi người nói to ví dụ quát trẻ con thì vẫn nghe được. 
Cảm giác chăn không sạch, đêm nào đi ngủ ở đây cũng bị ngứa da, rất khó chịu.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: La camera era molto spaziosa e ben organizzata. La posizione è comoda sia rispetto al centro, raggiungibile in una decina di minuti a piedi, sia alla zona dedicata agli aperitivi ed alle uscite la sera (sempre una decina di minuti a piedi). I servizi offerti sono efficienti: se desiderate l'hotel provvede ad organizzarvi anche il noleggio con conducente per visitare i palazzi ed i siti storici dislocati nel territorio (non raggiungibili a piedi). Per rilassarvi la sera potete farvi prenotare dalla receptionist un massaggio o farvi consigliare circa i locali della zona in base ai vostri gusti. Uscendo dall'hotel, andando verso destra, troverete un chioschetto dove si vendono i banh mi (panini), sono molto buoni ed economici, la signora è molto gentile e vi consiglio di provare il latte di soia che prepara! Ottima la colazione in hotel. Nel complesso, se dovessi tornare a Hue, soggiornerei ancora nello stesso posto.

review.rating: Lo consiglio per rapporto qualità prezzo e posizione.
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình (3 Người Lớn)
review.comment_positive:
Stanza e bagno puliti e grandi, letti comodi, bel terrazzino, con vista su viuzza e tetti della città se sarete ai piani più alti, set di cortesia completo. Colazione veramente buona, con buffet ad ampia scelta di dolce e salato, frutta fresca e anche cucina espressa. Zona centrale con parco molto bello in riva al fiume facile da raggiungere anche a piedi, così come la cittadella. Nella viuzza tranquilla dell’hotel ci sono ottimi ristorantini e noi ci siamo trovati molto bene al centro massaggi di fianco all’hotel. Di fronte c’è un noleggio moto.
Abbiamo viaggiato in coppia con un figlio di 13 anni e lo consiglio, rapporto qualità prezzo ottimo!! Parlano bene inglese, e ci hanno organizzato i trasferimenti senza problemi e a buon prezzo!

Clean and large room and bathroom, comfortable beds, nice little terrace, with a view over the alleyway and roofs of the city if you are on the higher floors, complete courtesy set. Really good breakfast, with a wide choice of sweet and savoury buffet, fresh fruit and also express food. Centrally located with a very nice park by the river that is also easy to reach on foot, as is the citadel. In the hotel's quiet alley there are excellent little restaurants and we had a very good time at the massage centre next to the hotel. There is a motorbike hire shop opposite.
We travelled as a couple with a 13-year-old son and I recommend it, very good value for money! They speek a good English

review.rating: Un merveilleux séjour grâce aux collaboratrices et collaborateurs de votre établissement.
review.room_type: Phòng Junior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
L’emplacement mais surtout la courtoisie et la totale disponibilité du personnel.

Un mot très particulier pour Thi (Sara) qui travaille a la réception et que tout au long de mon séjour s’est montrée d’une grande amabilité, serviable et toujours de bon conseil.
Ses bonnes manières et le fait de savoir écouter le client, font de Thi une collaboratrice hors norme .
Elle mérite à mon avis le titre d’employée de l’année de votre maison .

Je me permet de ces commentaires, car j’ai été actif pendant de longues années dans l’hôtellerie de luxe en Suisse et du fait je connais le métier .
Idem dans ce que concerne le Département des Ressources Humaines .

Merci à Thi ainsi qu’à tout le personnel de l’hôtel,  pour l’excellent souvenir que vous m’avez laissé lors de mon passage par Hue .

A tout bientôt,

Paulo Sousa

review.rating: A cosy, welcoming stay, perfectly nestled among the laneways
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: The staff are wonderful, the hotel is welcoming and so helpful. It's worth understanding that in Hue, a lot of the culture and fun of the city happens in the laneways off the main streets. That made the hotel a little bit hard to find, but that also places it right in the middle of the action! It was nestled in a laneway beside restaurants, specialty shops, and the coolest bar we've ever been to!
review.comment_negative: The hotel isn't run down, but hey do need to renew their décor and replace some decorations that have become damaged. It could just do with a little touch up and refresh, nothing major. Having said that, they haven't done that recently (and shouldn't) because with COVID has shut down tourism across the country for a couple of years and hasn't really kicked off again yet. When the tourists come back, I'm sure the hotel will do a little freshen up! If you want somewhere welcoming and well placed to stay, this hotel is great!

review.comment_positive:
What can I say? What a fabulous hotel worth every penny. The staff are so friendly and couldn't do enough for us. They also speak excellent English. The rooms are spotless, shower is nice and hot and the beds are comfortable. Housekeeping is done daily
 The location is right in the centre around the corner from walking street. Short walk to perfume river. They sorted out a motorbike for us and gave us valuable information of the area as soon as we arrived. The breakfast is lovely, buffet style. Eggs which ever way you want cooked are freshly made to order. 
We checked out and the cook asked me could she make something for my journey to take away with me. 
Lots of fabulous restaurants and bars next door, look out for The Nook up an alley next to the hotel, food is gorgeous and part of the bill goes to charity.

review.comment_positive:
La colazione è stata molto deludente,  la cucina dove è stata preparata è un locale con vetri, dai quali si vedeva la poca pulizia.
C'erano diversi moschini che si posavano sulla frutta. L"hotel si trova vicino al centro di Hue, ma lontano dalla cittadella.
L'hotel non dispone di un servizio bar, quindi non si possono comprare bevande.
La camera, invece, era pulita.
Le ragazze della recependo sono tutte molto gentili e disponibili.
Il condizionatore della nostra stanza non funzionava ed è subito stato aggiustato.
review.comment_negative: La colazione e la pulizia del locale della cucina e della colazione.

review.comment_positive: We loved our stay at Hue Serene Palace Hotel! The rooms are spacious and comfortable, & our view from the balcony was beautiful. The staff are warm, welcoming & very accommodating (they made my partner fresh ginger tea for his stomach whenever we asked). We loved our breakfast each morning, must try banana pancakes! The location for us was very convenient. We would happily return and stay again. Thank you for having us 🙌🏼!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: The receptionist Amy was excellent! She was particularly helpful and spoke excellent English. The other staff were fabulous too! The room was comfy and the breakfast was excellent with everything we wanted and more! We found several restaurants close to us serving very tasty food. We walked to the Citadel and the hotel organised a cab to the tombs so everything was very easy for us.
review.comment_negative: Nothing about the hotel! Unfortunately the weather was very wet so we didn’t walk around the hotel area as much as we would like to explore!

review.room_type: Phòng Junior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: La recepcionista que hablaba ingles fue muy amable y tenia muy buen sentido del humor.
review.comment_negative: El hotel no coincide con las fotos. Tuvimos que cambiar una de las habitaciones por el fuerte olor a humedad. No habia posibilidad de desayuno, ni albornoz en el baño, y el hotel estaba lleno de trastos por los pasillos. La caja fuerte no funcionaba y el cajetin de la llave fallaba mucho. No nos dieron una segunda llave. La recepcionista se disculpó por el estado del hotel diciendo que se debía al poco tiempo que lleva abierto.

Chambre spacieuse et  calme, Bon petit déjeuner dans une grande salle.

review.rating: Great place to stay whilst in Hue
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Great location - close to bars and restaurants but also quiet as had a room facing the back of building

Very friendly and welcoming staff

Spacious room

Clean and comfortable - I fell asleep instantly both nights

Good breakfast - I didn't struggle as a vegetarian like I have with many places I have visited in Vietnam

AC worked well

Plenty of charging points around the room 

Multiple seats and places to store clothes, etc. Didn't have to put bags on the floor either.

Plenty of toilet paper in bathroom

Usual toiletries provided 

There were a set of scales too which would be helpful if wanting to check baggage weight before a flight (or your own weight!) 

Allowed me to store bags after check out
review.comment_negative:
The shower, whilst it had a good pressure, was somewhat temperamental and goes cool after 5 minutes or so but this seems to be the norm for most places I have been in SEA.

It didn't bother me being a solo traveller but couples should note that the bed is 2 singles pushed together.

Some of the best customer service I have had at a hotel anywhere! 
Even had a bath in the ensuite.
Would recommend.

review.comment_positive: What an absolute bargain. The hotel exceeded our expectations. We had a top floor room with a balcony, with lovely views over the city. Nice big room with a large comfortable bed. Good size bathroom with a lot of little exras if tou needed them (toothbrushes, etc.). The staff were very friendly and helpful, even gave us a coffee while we were waiting for the taxi to pick us up. The location is great, a five minute walk to the very lively centre, but down a quiet narrow road Very little noise at night even though there were live bands at the weekend. Breakfast was a choice of cooked or fruits, cold meat, and cereal.

review.rating: My stay at this hotel was truly enjoyable, thanks to the outstanding staff!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
I must begin by highlighting the exceptional staff at this hotel. Their willingness to assist and their fluency in English made a significant difference in ensuring a pleasant stay. Their impeccable service truly stood out.

My room was a haven of cleanliness, and I particularly enjoyed the luxurious bath that was available. It added a touch of indulgence to my stay, and I appreciated this feature immensely.

The breakfast buffet was a delightful culinary experience. It offered a diverse selection, catering to both Vietnamese and Western tastes. What made it even more enjoyable was the lady who oversaw the buffet. She was accommodating, always going the extra mile to ensure that guests had a memorable dining experience.

The bed was a highlight of my room. It was incredibly comfortable, and the plush bedding provided a cosy atmosphere for a restful night's sleep. Moreover, the room's cleanliness was consistent throughout my stay, which is a crucial factor in any accommodation.

The hotel's location was another advantage, with numerous restaurants just down the street, making dining options convenient and varied.
review.comment_negative:
I want to start by acknowledging the hotel's commendable commitment to cleanliness, which was highly appreciated. However, one aspect that left room for improvement was the lingering chemical or hospital-like smell in the room. While the cleanliness was evident, it would enhance the overall experience if this odour issue could be addressed to provide a more pleasant ambience.

Additionally, it would have been convenient to have a minibar in the room, stocked with a selection of soft drinks. This would have provided guests with more beverage options and added to the convenience of their stay.

Despite these minor points, the hotel's positive aspects such as the excellent staff, comfortable accommodations, and a diverse breakfast buffet remain noteworthy. The location, with its proximity to restaurants, also adds to the overall appeal of the hotel. I would still recommend this establishment to fellow travellers, with the hope that the mentioned issues could be addressed for an even more enjoyable stay in the future.

review.comment_positive:
Localisation, propreté, accueil, équipements bien.
Le point fort de notre séjour a clairement été la bienvillantebet chaleureuse Catherine! Elle nous a arrangé la location d'un scooter (d'une qualité irréprochable, pas comme les autres locations brinquebalantes que nous avons connues), notre transfert en Easy Riders vers Hoi An (de nouveau qualité au top) et réservé une nuit dans un autre hôtel pour une nuit en plus à Hué non prévue initialement (prix négocié en plus)!
Merci à elle pour son enthousiasme et ses bons soins!
review.comment_negative:
Petit moins pour le pommeau de la douche qui ne tenait pas bien en place. 
Le petit déjeuner était correct mais les mêmes plats étaient meilleurs dans d'autres hôtels de la même gamme

review.comment_positive: We stayed 6 nights in this wonderful hotel. The staff were the friendliest, most professional and helpful we have had anywhere in Vietnam. They treated us like family and had beautiful humour. Every staff member from the reception, doormen, breakfast staff to the cleaners couldnt have been better. The rooms were comfortable, roomy and clean with a balcony. Breakfast was delicious with omelettes and eggs made to order as well as  a good variety of other options. Great location. Would stay here again.

review.comment_positive:
Such a fabulous hotel in a great location. Right in the middle of things, but in a quiet side road so you aren't disturbed. 
Rooms were a good size and were clean, comfortable, modern, and had great air con. 
Breakfast was really lovely and the kids loved the fish in the foyer!
The staff here make it truly brilliant as they are so kind and helpful.  We had a couple of issues (a noisy guest in the next room and a cyclo driver who tried to scam us) and the hotel staff were exceptional - They resolved both issues and could not have been more brilliant. 
The hotel is right near the walking street and lots of shops and restaurants. We would definitely stay again.

Phòng Junior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
La relación calidad precio es buenísima. 
La localización en el centro de la ciudad junto al palacio imperial muy cómoda para moverte por la ciudad.
A destacar sobretodo el trato recibido por parte de todo el personal del hotel. Nos ayudaron en todo lo que pudieron y más. 
Llegamos muy temprano y nos permitieron entrar antes de la hora del check in.
Además necesitábamos un taxi a media noche para coger un vuelo y nos pusieron todo facilidades para encontrarlo. 
Pero lo que más agradecimos es su empatía y colaboración cuando perdimos un móvil. Era de noche y se encargaron de llamar a varias compañías de taxis para intentar localizarlo. Y finalmente así fue. Un 10 de 10 de alojamiento
review.comment_negative: Estaba todo muy bien.

review.room_type: Phòng Junior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_negative: Antes de hacer la reserva mandamos un email para verificar que se podía hacer early check in pues llegaríamos a Hue muy pronto por la mañana tras viajar toda la noche en el bus. Nos dijeron que si hay habitaciones libres, sin problema se puede hacer antes el check in (es algo bastante común en Vietnam que ya lo hemos hecho varias veces; incluso check out tarde para coger bus nocturno). Cuando llegamos al hotel a las 6am no pudimos comunicarnos con el recepcionista. Por tanto, llamaron a la recepcionista que sabía inglés y hablé con ella por teléfono. Me dijo que si queríamos entrar a esa hora a la habitación, teníamos que pagar más y yo le dije que nunca me dijo eso en el email que me mandó. No llegamos a un acuerdo y, por tanto, cancelamos la reserva y nos fuimos a otro hotel cercano que por 380.000vnd nos dejo entrar seguido, e incluso nos ofreció desayuno para ese mismo día. Más dormir 1 noche con desayuno, claro.

review.comment_positive:
An amazing place to stay in Hue. The staff were so warm and welcoming as soon as we entered. Let us check in a bit earlier due to our early arrival and took our bags up to our room. When we came down, they had a map for us and told us some great places to eat and visit. 

Breakfast was included in our booking and it was fairly decent. Lots of fresh fruit and some hot options. 

We needed to check out early (5:00am). They weren’t sure if grabs/taxis would be operating that early so they booked us a private car for 250,000VND (which was same price as taxi or grab). Due to us leaving early, we would miss breakfast, so they made us some food to go to take with us when we checked out. 

Rooms were nice, spacious and clean. Bathroom was clean and had a good shower. Bed was big and comfy. 

Overall, we had a great experience here and would happily book again if we returned to Hue.

review.comment_negative:
Cogimos el minibus que ofrecía el hotel para desplazarnos hasta Hoi An y las paradas sobraban todas, menos la de Marble Mountain, que era lo realmente interesante. Paramos en un pueblo que sólo tenía de interés un puentecito, Lap An Lagoon (totalmente prescindible) y un mirador que tampoco se veía mucho como mirador.
Lo único interesante era Marble Mountain y My Son, y sólo te meten el primero.

review.comment_positive: aimee at reception helped us out so so much. we messed up our hai van pass tour and had to head back to hue. when we got back we was cold and wet and didn't know what to do. aimee helped us get warm, dried our clothes and gave us tea to keep warm. they also booked us a bus to hoi an (where we tried to get to initially) they were so very helpful and saved our situation. the rooms were clean and lovely and very well priced. i could not recommend enough. we are so thankful for their help. and we made it to hoi an just 8 hours later than we was meant to. thank you so much to this serene palace hotel!!! definitely stay here!!

review.comment_positive:
We like the free upgrade to Junior Double or Twin room. The sitting area with a coffee table was a nice touch. The good WiFi connection, complimentary bottled water and 3-in-1 coffee sachets all adds up to a comfortable stay. The jacuzzi bath was great. It really soothed my aching feet and legs after all the walking. There is no lack of food outlets; both local and foreign cuisines nearby. Also shops providing a range of services from haircut to spa services are within walking distance. 
Ms Amy and her colleagues are to be commended for making our stay such a pleasant experience. We will come back if we visit Hue again.

review.comment_positive:
Mọi mặt của khách sạn đều vượt quá mong đợi của tôi cho một khách sạn 3 sao. 
Phòng rộng rãi, sạch sẽ theo chuẩn quốc tế, trang trí nội thất của khách sạn rất mỹ thuật, sang trọng và mang lại cảm giác ấm cúng.
Bữa sáng phong phú.
Nhân viên lịch sự và chuyên nghiệp.
Gia đình chúng tôi rất vui đã chọn khách sạn  này.
review.comment_negative: Buffet sáng hơi chật, sắp xếp chưa được thuận tiện.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: The breakfast was great, they asked us if we wanted to have something to go and got 2 boxes full of fruits. They took the time to tell us what to do in Hué with the possibility to rent a scooter at the hotel for a small price. And because we arrived early they we could shower in a separate bathroom, join breakfast for just 80.000 dong each (about 3$). After breakfast and refreshing our room was ready 3 hours before the original check in time!
